thread.title: What's the connection between Amir Khan and 'Anarkali'
thread.title_full: What's the connection between Amir Khan and 'Anarkali' - The Times of India

author: Anjana George
title: What's the connection between Amir Khan and 'Anarkali'
text:
'Anarkali' that stars Prithviraj Sukumaran, Miya George, Priyal Gor, Biju Menon, Sudev Nair, Kabir Bedi and Samskruthy Shenoy will have songs that have the taste of Sufism and Hundustani.
The music is composed by Vidyasagar and written by Manoj Muntashir who wrote Dil darbar song from PK movie which was crooned by Ankit Tiwari
